item.title: Title Sequence
item.description: On one of this season's best shows, saxophonist and composer Cercie Miller leads an incredible group whose debut CD Dedication on Stash Records is getting national airplay. She founded the avant-garde jazz collective, Your Neighborhood Saxophone Quartet, which performed at the 1989 Boston Globe Jazz Festival. Cercie's group includes some of Boston's best: Tim Ray on piano, David Clark on bass, and Bob Savine on drums.
